title: Sports Discussion App
description: A full-stack web app for sports fans to discuss daily AI-generated questions, featuring a Django/PostgreSQL backend, a React frontend, and deployed via Choreo for CI/CD and hosting.

title: Pennsylvania Department of Education Project
description: A collaborative web application built with Django to organize and display Pennsylvania Department of Education data using a clean and searchable interface.

title: Woddle (Wordle Clone)
description: A Wordle clone inspired by the New York Times game. Guess the hidden five-letter word in six tries.

title: Personal Website
description: A personal portfolio showcaseing projects and contact information.
